# YAML设置

## pdf输出

---
title: "Tufte样式"
subtitle: "一个R Markdown实现"
author: "JJ Allaire，谢益辉"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:
  tufte::tufte_html: default
  tufte::tufte_book:
    citation_package: natbib
    latex_engine: xelatex
  tufte::tufte_handout:
    citation_package: natbib
    latex_engine: xelatex
ctex: yes
link-citations: yes
---

## html输出

---
title: ""
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output:
  rmdformats::readthedown:
    highlight: kate
---

## doc输出

---
title: "Untitled"
author: "环境与健康研究室"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: word_document
---
